title: OpenType PS1 in MS Office
content:
Hi,  
I have been told that OpenType PS1 fonts can cause problems in MS Office on a PC. Does anyone know what type of problems these might be?  
Best regards  
Henning
author: dehac

comments.content: The main (only?) problem is the inability of Office to embed PostScript fonts (including PostScript-flavored OpenType fonts) into Office documents.
